document.body:
HOME | CONTACT US | COMPANY | CHANNEL PARTNERS Home Rates Services Products InstaRate Quote Newsroom
USERNAME
PASSWORD
Before you begin, take a moment to review a listing of the information you will need to have available in order to complete the application. Once you have this information on hand, begin the merchant agreement below. The agreement should take 10-15 minutes to complete; once you submit the agreement, we will process it and fax it back to you for your signature. Once signed, send the hard copy to CoCard in order for the agreement to be valid.
Here's What You Will Need
Adobe Acrobat Reader Software installed on your PC to view PDF's [ Download Here ] Business Contact Information (addresses, phone and fax numbers, contact email address, Web site address, etc.) Federal Tax ID or SSN for a sole proprietorship Company Ownership Information (including the owners' SSNs) Bank Reference and Routing Information (found at the bottom of a blank business check) Two invoices from suppliers (containing contact information and account number) In order to fill out the application you must meet the following criteria
